item.title: HackTheBox - Netmon WT
item.description: Box IP: 10.10.10.152 Reconnaissance 1) I started with scanning network. Here’s what I found 2) Port 80, we have a login page or PRTG Network Monitor. I found it was vulnerable for cross site Vulnerability 3) filezilla, I messed around with ftp 21..looking for the configuration.old file that contained the creds according to this post on reddit https://www.reddit.com/r/sysadmin/comments/862b8s/prtg_gave_away_some_of_your_passwords/ .. But I couldnt find it.. later on I was hinted that It was a hiddden file.

item.title: HackTheBox - ACCESS WT
item.description: Box IP: 10.10.10.98 Reconnaissance 1) I started with scanning network. Here’s what I found PORT STATE SERVICE VERSION **21/tcp open ftp Microsoft ftpd** **23/tcp open telnet?** ————- ————————————- **80/tcp open http Microsoft IIS httpd 7.5** ————- ————————————- 2) Port 80, we have a picture of a server room, “out.jpg” .. saved that for later
